solution_line_template: He wants to rent for {total_days} days and there is a deal if you rent for {deal_days} days so that leaves {total_days}-{deal_days} = <<{total_days}-{deal_days}={individual_days}>>{individual_days} individual days

Each individual day is ${individual_day_rate} and he will have {individual_days} individual days for a total of {individual_day_rate}*{individual_days} = $<<{individual_day_rate}*{individual_days}={individual_days_cost}>>{individual_days_cost}
{deal_days} days costs ${deal_cost} and {individual_days} days costs ${individual_days_cost} for a total of {deal_cost}+{individual_days_cost} = ${total_cost}
